Text: Giuseppe Tornatore:  He is considered as one of the directors who brought critical acclaim back to Italian cinema.
Triplets:<Giuseppe Tornatore
2:
--------------------
<Text: Giuseppe Tornatore:  In a career spanning over 30 years he is best known for directing and writing drama films such as "The Legend of 1900", "Malèna", "Baarìa" and "The Best Offer".>
Triplets:<Giuseppe Tornatore
4:
--------------------
Text: Giuseppe Tornatore:  He directed also several advertising campaigns for Dolce & Gabbana.
Triplets:<Giuseppe Tornatore
